amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title II of the bill, eliminating the legislation's "CutGo" process which requires that agencies eliminate rules identified by the Regulatory Retrospective Review Commission prior to issuing a new rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 4 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to strike title II of the bill, eliminating the legislation's "cut-go" process which requires that agencies eliminate rules identified by the Regulatory Retrospective Review Commission prior to issuing a new rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 239 (Roll no. 13).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 239 (Roll no. 13).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
